014package org.gbif.api.vocabulary;
015
016import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
017
018import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
019import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertTrue;
020import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.fail;
021
022public class DatasetSubtypeTest {
023
024  @Test
025  public void testFromString() {
026    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.INVENTORY_THEMATIC, DatasetSubtype.fromString("inventory_thematic"));
027    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.INVENTORY_THEMATIC, DatasetSubtype.fromString("inventory thematic"));
028    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.INVENTORY_THEMATIC, DatasetSubtype.fromString("inventory-thematic"));
029    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.INVENTORY_THEMATIC, DatasetSubtype.fromString("inventory.thematic"));
030    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.TAXONOMIC_AUTHORITY, DatasetSubtype.fromString("TAXONOMIC authority"));
031    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.NOMENCLATOR_AUTHORITY, DatasetSubtype.fromString("NOMENCLATOR AUTHORITY"));
032    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.INVENTORY_REGIONAL, DatasetSubtype.fromString("INVENTORY_REGIONAL"));
033    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.GLOBAL_SPECIES_DATASET, DatasetSubtype.fromString("GLOBAL_SPECIES_DATASET"));
034    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.DERIVED_FROM_OCCURRENCE, DatasetSubtype.fromString("DERIVED_FROM_OCCURRENCE"));
035    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.SPECIMEN, DatasetSubtype.fromString("SPECIMEN"));
036    assertEquals(DatasetSubtype.OBSERVATION, DatasetSubtype.fromString("OBSERVATION"));
037  }
038
039  @Test
040  public void testSamplingEventDatasetSubtypes() {
041    assertEquals(2, DatasetSubtype.SAMPLING_EVENT_DATASET_SUBTYPES.size());
042    assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.SAMPLING_EVENT_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(DatasetSubtype.OBSERVATION));
043    assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.SAMPLING_EVENT_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(DatasetSubtype.SPECIMEN));
044  }
045
046  @Test
047  public void testOccurrenceDatasetSubtypes() {
048    assertEquals(2, DatasetSubtype.OCCURRENCE_DATASET_SUBTYPES.size());
049    assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.OCCURRENCE_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(DatasetSubtype.OBSERVATION));
050    assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.OCCURRENCE_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(DatasetSubtype.SPECIMEN));
051  }
052
053  @Test
054  public void testChecklistDatasetSubtypes() {
055    assertEquals(6, DatasetSubtype.CHECKLIST_DATASET_SUBTYPES.size());
056    assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.CHECKLIST_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(DatasetSubtype.INVENTORY_THEMATIC));
057    assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.CHECKLIST_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(DatasetSubtype.TAXONOMIC_AUTHORITY));
058    assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.CHECKLIST_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(DatasetSubtype.NOMENCLATOR_AUTHORITY));
059    assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.CHECKLIST_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(DatasetSubtype.INVENTORY_REGIONAL));
060    assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.CHECKLIST_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(DatasetSubtype.GLOBAL_SPECIES_DATASET));
061    assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.CHECKLIST_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(DatasetSubtype.DERIVED_FROM_OCCURRENCE));
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * A test to make sure all values of the enumeration are in at exactly one of the two sets (groups).
066   */
067  @Test
068  public void testEnumerationGrouping() {
069    for (DatasetSubtype e : DatasetSubtype.values()) {
070      if (DatasetSubtype.CHECKLIST_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(e) && DatasetSubtype.OCCURRENCE_DATASET_SUBTYPES
071        .contains(e)) {
072        fail("Enumeration present in both sets - can only be present in one");
073      } else if (!DatasetSubtype.CHECKLIST_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(e) && !DatasetSubtype.OCCURRENCE_DATASET_SUBTYPES
074        .contains(e)) {
075        fail("Enumeration not present in either set");
076      } else {
077        assertTrue(DatasetSubtype.CHECKLIST_DATASET_SUBTYPES.contains(e) || DatasetSubtype.OCCURRENCE_DATASET_SUBTYPES
078          .contains(e));
079      }
080    }
081  }
082}
